title: Стеклянная
licensing_note: Lyrics fetched via Musixmatch API; translations via local Ollama.

lines.translation: Doors are closed, and you believed
lines.grammar: The verb 'поверил' is in the second person singular, indicating a direct address to the listener.

lines.translation: Glass is the most
The doors are closed, but you believed
Glass is the most

lines.text: Вышла в сад, я забыла твои слова
lines.translation: I went out into the garden and forgot your words.

lines.text: То, что розы красивы лишь на глазах
lines.translation: That roses are only beautiful to the eye
Having been injected only once

lines.text: Будто в сказке уснуло сердце без лишних фраз
lines.translation: As if in a fairy tale the heart fell asleep without unnecessary phrases

lines.text: Не нужно больше фраз, ведь это не показ
lines.translation: No need for more phrases, because this is not a show
It's easier to seem than to be

lines.text: Мне тошно от игр, не буду любить
lines.translation: I'm sick of games, I won't love them.
It's easier to forget everything. It's easier to do everything.
Destroy or preserve?
Drink and forget? Fall in love?

lines.text: В сердце закрыты двери, а ты поверил
lines.translation: The doors to your heart are closed, but you believed
The glass rose is the best

lines.text: В сердце закрыты двери, а ты поверил
lines.translation: The doors to your heart are closed, but you believed
The glass rose is the best

lines.text: В сердце закрыты двери, а ты поверил

lines.text: В сердце закрыты двери, а ты поверил
lines.translation: The doors to your heart are closed, but you believed
The glass rose is the best of the best
He doesn't stay angry for long, he will be overcome with melancholy
My insomnia comes with pain

lines.text: Радости нет в лице, разводы с солью
lines.translation: There is no joy in the face, streaks of salt

lines.text: Глаза мои сейчас расскажут, кто я
lines.translation: My eyes will now tell who I am
Sadness burns
The pulse beats on the lips
Read me a poem
Maybe I'll fall asleep
Thoughts on tape recorder
lines.grammar: The preposition в (in) is used to indicate the medium or tool for recording thoughts.

lines.translation: A tablet like a cartridge
The air presses down
Go out to the balcony

lines.text: Не нужно больше фраз, ведь это не показ
lines.translation: No need for more phrases, because this is not a show
It's easier to seem than to be

lines.text: Мне тошно от игр, не буду любить
lines.translation: I'm sick of games, I won't love them.
It's easier to forget everything. It's easier to do everything.

Drink and forget? Fall in love?

lines.translation: The doors to your heart are closed, but you believed
